items.sentence: I hope we can avoid these mistakes in the future.
What are the differences between dogs and wolves?
Tom met Mary one day when he was walking his dog.
There used to be a lot of stray dogs around here.
Tom will only be in Boston for a couple of weeks.
Tom is lucky that somebody will help him do that.
Tom is absolutely certain that Mary is in Boston.
Tom is worried that his cat will never come back.
Tom wasn't the only one that knew where Mary was.
Tom went back to Boston to live with his parents.
Tom's explanation wasn't very easy to understand.
The advice we got from Tom didn't really help us.
Tom went back into his house to get his backpack.
Tom hung his diploma on the wall behind his desk.
I can't imagine anybody really does that anymore.
I can't juggle very well yet, but I'm practicing.
I can't put up with your carelessness any longer.
You don't have to stay here if you don't want to.
Listening to this kind of music puts me to sleep.
You're in no condition to leave the hospital yet.
